title: DevStories Common Definitions
description: Shared type definitions for story and epic frontmatter schemas

storyId.description: Story identifier in PREFIX-NNN format (e.g., DS-001, STORY-123)

storyIdOrWikiLink.description: Story ID in PREFIX-NNN or [[PREFIX-NNN]] wiki-link format

epicId.description: Epic identifier in PREFIX-NNN format or EPIC-INBOX

storyType.description: Story type: feature (new functionality), bug (fix), task (general work), chore (maintenance)

storySize.description: T-shirt size estimate for story complexity
